basic.description:
An examination of major issues in modern philosophy. Possible topics to be considered include arguments for the existence of God, causation, happiness, representationalism, scepticism and substance.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Modern Philosophy

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).
